name: Age of Wonders 2
notes: Game runs in fullscreen, but the intro does not play. In window mode both game and intro work great however.

files.aow2: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Age of Wonders 2/AoW2.exe
files:
- aow2: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: null
    executable: aow2
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
